=Compiling BOINC on a ARM/Ubuntu platform=



=== Simple Install Script ===

||{{{#!/bin/bash

sudo apt-get install autoconf m4 openssl libcurl4-openssl-dev libtool subversion

svn co http://boinc.berkeley.edu/svn/trunk/boinc 
svn checkout https://setisvn.ssl.berkeley.edu/svn/seti_boinc
wget http://www.fftw.org/fftw-3.2.2.tar.gz 
tar xvzf fftw-3.3-beta1.tar.gz

cd boinc/
./_autosetup
./configure --disable-server CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon" CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon"
make
cd ../fftw-3.2.2/
wget http://code.google.com/p/fftw-neon/downloads/detail?name=fftw-3.2.2-neon-1.diff&can=2&q=
patch -p1 < fftw-3.2.2-neon-1.diff
./configure CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon" CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon"
make
sudo make install
cd ../seti_boinc
./_autosetup
./configure --disable-server CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon" CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon"
make}}}||
